content.text:
[Top: Black and white photo of building with columns]
[Middle: Blue card/patch with text: MARK TWAIN JHS]
[Bottom: American flag card with Pledge of Allegiance]
I pledge allegiance to the flag of the United States
of America and to the Republic for which it stands,
one nation, under God, indivisible, with liberty and
justice for all.
©1997 Pearl Publishing

text_sections.full_transcription:
MARK TWAIN JHS (on blue card/patch)

I pledge allegiance to the flag of the United States
of America and to the Republic for which it stands,
one nation, under God, indivisible, with liberty and
justice for all.

©1997 Pearl Publishing

metadata.subject: Official documents and Pledge of Allegiance

insights: Page contains official/patriotic imagery and text
Includes Pledge of Allegiance in full
Government building photograph suggests official or ceremonial context

photos.description: Black and white photograph of Mark Twain JHS building entrance with columns

logos: Mark Twain JHS emblem with laurel wreath and diamond shape on blue background

forensic_notes: Three items: school photo, school emblem, pledge card
Mark Twain Junior High School building photo
Mark Twain JHS emblem/patch with laurel wreath design
American flag pledge card ©1997 Pearl Publishing
Building photo shows classical architecture with columns
Blue and white school colors on emblem
Connects to earlier Mark Twain JHS references in book
